content: **needles and notions** us 7 4 50 mm 32 inch circular needle tapestry needle scissors **yarn** light dk to sport weight 50 grams of a main color 50 grams of a contrast color sample uses apothefaery fabrications luxury linen dk alpaca and silk 270 yards / 100 grams main color is cat briar green contrast color is briar rose purple variegated **sizes** one size **finished measurement** finished circumference at neck - 22 inches 55 88 cm finished length from neck to longest point in front - 14 inches 35 56 cm **gauge** swatch knitted with us 7 4 50 mm metal needle using continental style 24 stitches and 56 row = 4 inches in linen stitch pattern see chart a it is recommended to wet block your swatch and allow it to dry completely before measuring gauge
